DOC.brief_summary: This study will determine the pharmacokinetic profile of the salbutamol concentration in the urine while athletes are resting or during exercise.
DOC.brief_title: Diagnosis et Treatment of Asthma in Athlete : Boundary Between Disease and Doping
DOC.criteria: patient who hold a license in a sport federation, and do at least 8 hours of sport each week asthmatic patient
